title: Discontinuance or settlement
context: [ยง414-176] Discontinuance or settlement. A derivative proceeding may not be discontinued or settled without the court&rsquo;s approval. If the court determines that a proposed discontinuance or settlement will substantially affect the interests of the corporation&rsquo;s shareholders or a class of shareholders, the court shall direct that notice be given to the shareholders affected. [L 2000, c 244, pt of ยง1]
